SkTSearch.h

00002 #define SkTSearch_DEFINED

00004 #include "SkTypes.h"

00006 template <typename T>
00007 int SkTSearch(const T* base, int count, T target, size_t elemSize)
00008 {
00009         SkASSERT(base != nil);
00010         SkASSERT(count >= 0);
00011 
00012         if (count <= 0)
00013                 return ~0;
00014 
00015         int     lo = 0;
00016         int     hi = count - 1;
00017 
00018         while (lo < hi)
00019         {
00020                 int mid = (hi + lo) >> 1;
00021                 const T* elem = (const T*)((const char*)base + mid * elemSize);
00022 
00023                 if (*elem < target)
00024                         lo = mid + 1;
00025                 else
00026                         hi = mid;
00027         }
00028 
00029         const T* elem = (const T*)((const char*)base + hi * elemSize);
00030         if (*elem != target)
00031         {
00032                 if (*elem < target)
00033                         hi += 1;
00034                 hi = ~hi;
00035         }
00036         return hi;
00037 }
